类的使用
org.springframework.web.context.request.ServletWebRequest

  • 使用ServletWebRequest的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.context.request.async
    Support for asynchronous request processing.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.handler
    Provides standard HandlerMapping implementations, including abstract base classes for custom implementations.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation
    MVC infrastructure for annotation-based handler method processing, building on the org.springframework.web.method.annotation package.

    • org.springframework.web.context.request.async中ServletWebRequest的使用

      org.springframework.web.context.request.async中ServletWebRequest的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  StandardServletAsyncWebRequest
      A Servlet 3.0 implementation of AsyncWebRequest.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.handler中ServletWebRequest的使用

      org.springframework.web.servlet.handler中ServletWebRequest的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DispatcherServletWebRequest
      ServletWebRequest subclass that is aware of DispatcherServlet's request context, such as the Locale determined by the configured LocaleResolver.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中ServletWebRequest的使用

      参数类型为ServletWebRequest的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ServletInvocableHandlerMethod.invokeAndHandle(ServletWebRequest webRequest, ModelAndViewContainer mavContainer, java.lang.Object... providedArgs)
      Invoke the method and handle the return value through one of the configured HandlerMethodReturnValueHandlers.
